attributes.action: set up a petition board in every council office where the people of our country may sign or not on the relevent issues that matter to us all
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: it is a simple thing that i ask ,the establishment of a signed system wherby the people of our nation may respond to the goverments ideas for OUR future. whether it be , where we spend taxpayers money, the national health service, unemployment, immigration, or education. for we are the people goverment policy affects most , the hard working people of england.
